channel.title: RP Server
channel.description:
[center][b]Basic Information[/b]
I'm going to start work on a Server where the players will never get bored. The Server will be a type or Roleplay Server where the players can get Jobs such as Bounty Hunters, Doctors, Salesman, Real estate, chef, etc.
You will be able to Rob Money and Items from NPCs but doing so will cause your Crime % to go up, and when it reaches 100% a bounty will be put out where as other players will receive the set amount of money when they kill\catch you.
Also you will be able to buy a House where you can lock the door and nobody can get in without a key, ofcourse the Police will be able to break doors down and get in if needed. You will be able to give other players Keys so they can lock\unlock the door.
The whole Server will be a PK zone excluding The Drop party area where Killing is prohibited.
Jail system based on the Crime %, higher Crime = longer time in jail.
Each minute the player is on the Server they will be given money, as they stay on longer they will earn more per minute.
The ability to buy items to be placed in the house if you own it.
~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~
[b]Ideas[/b]
Players will start in Varrock where they can go to the castle and get a Job, Once they have their job they can go around doing whatever.
All cities except varrock will be blocked off because of a "Virus outbreak" and as we finish the cities, fix doors, npcs, ladders, trees ,etc we will open them up for visitation and a new place for the players to live.
~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~
[b]Website & Forum[/b]
Released once we get approved and start Coding
~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~
[b]Team[/b]
NPC\Shop Coder [Placement of NPCs and Prices\Items In the Shops] - -
Engineer [Fixes Doors, Trees, Ladders, Crates] - -
Scripter [Coding the Crime, Jail, Bounty System] - -
Online [WebSite, Forums Management, Coding] - -
General [General Coding, Sounds, Bugs, Glitches, Config] - -
Note: More Jobs will be added, and Existing Jobs will be edited.
~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~
[b]Status[/b]
Overall Status [||||||||||||||||||||] (1%)
------------------------------------------------------------- [size=8pt]Green = Complete | Blue = Started | Red = Not Started[/size] -------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Crime System[/b] Bounty System [b]NPC Placement[/b] Weapon Stats [b]Armour Stats[/b] Shops [b]Ladders[/b] Doors [b]Housing[/b] Jobs [b]Jail System[/b] Commands [b]Wages[/b] NPC Stealing [b]Anti Null[/b] Multi-Log fix X-Log fix [b]Anti SYI[/b] Anti Dupe [b]Melee following[/b] Range following [b]Magic following[/b] Full Combat (Range, Mage, Melee) [b]Court System[/b] Client Models [b]Client Sprites[/b] Client Config + More Soon +
~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~
[b]Other[/b]
Programs we may use:
[b]DropBox[/b] [For Sharing Files and keeping Each other Up-To-Date]
[b]Teamviewer[/b] [For Helping Each other]
[b]MSN[/b] [Communication]
~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~`~
[b]Application[/b]
Please use this Application to Apply for the Team.
[code] Name: Age: Job: Experience: Why Should you be Accepted: MSN: E-Mail: How Long Can you Code: Days A Week Available: Other: ~~~ If you cannot fill an area out please insert *NA* [/code]

item.title: RP Server
item.dc:creator: @messer188 messer188
item.description:
@messer188 wrote:

Name: Nick
Age:16
Job:fourms/basic coder
Experience:i make decent forums and also have made my own server and know how they run and have basic knowledge about coding
Why Should you be Accepted:I have had multiple years of experience in rsps
MSN: messerscape@live.com
E-Mail:^^same as MSN
How Long Can you Code: umm 3-4 hours when im on
Days A Week Available:usually everyday but grounded right now but be off shortly
Other: very east to talk to and can help in many ways and also think you have a good idea!

Read full topic

item.title: RP Server
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

Name:Michael
Age:13
Job:Online/custom items and some customs npc + a little coding
Experience:ArmagedonZone,highlightscape ,richscape + more i cant remember.
Why Should you be Accepted:Because i like coding and i want to help out because i have a lot of spare time on my hands
MSN:mursanari1@hotmail.com
E-Mail:mursanari1@hotmail.com
How Long Can you Code:about 5 hours a day more on the weekends
Days A Week Available:6-7

extra info: i live in australia so i probs wont be on the same time you are so email me the stuff u want me to do (thats if i get the job)

Read full topic

E-Mail:runehawk655@yahoo.com
How Long Can you Code:Most my time on Forums.

Awesome, Love the Forums. I’ll contact you VIA MSN with more details.
